name: Pechac
description: A Mayan god-inspired monster with stone and water elements. Its body resembles ancient temple carvings with flowing water channels. A fierce warrior that strikes with devastating force.

ability.name: Torrent
ability.description: Powers up Water-type moves when HP is low (below 33%)

moves.name: Aqua Cannon
moves.description: The user fires a powerful blast of water at the target with tremendous force.

moves.name: Stone Edge
moves.description: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Rapid Strike
moves.description: The user strikes the target multiple times in quick succession. Hits 2-5 times.

moves.name: Temple Crash
moves.description: The user crashes down like a collapsing temple. High power but user takes recoil damage.
